Name: Celestial_a24
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 beta 13+, MEV v5.4 AND DEA a05t2+. Recommended VEA. Celestial, shortened as CS, is a spin off of ND and the dial-down version of Interstellar with some interesting twists on modded enemies.
    Alpha 24:
  - Refinery: At 1p, NormalWaveInterval increases to 240s after 200s of in-game mission timer.
  - Line-Cutting Turret: Fix negative ignition temp value.
  - Fire Praetorian: Movement Speed x1.15/1.4 -> x1.25/1.5. Removed SpawnSpread during Defense.
  - The Sun: Increase ATKSPD (Grunt) buff ~17% -> ~25% (+50% -> +95% AttackCooldownModifier).
  - Crawler: MaxSpawnCount 5/7/10 -> 4/5/7/10.
  - Rats: OnFireHeatRange 1.5m -> 0.5m. Now uses default variant instead of biome variant.
  - Sewer Rats: OnFireHeatRange 1.5m -> 0.5m, Scale 1.75 -> 1.5 and gain 30% resistance to Fire damage. Now uses default variant instead of biome variant. Fix a bug where texture doesn't apply for clients. Changed Material slightly to look more purple-y.
  - White Exploder from Breder and Spider Egg: Fix a bug where Radioactive exploders are spawned instead of white exploders in REZ biome.
